Directions: Refer to the passage(s) and image(s) shown, then answer each question that follows.
Title: A Trip to the Planetarium â€“ Part 2
Content: After the planetarium presentation, students participated in a computer-based activity. The computer program showed the sun, the planets, moons, asteroids, and comets moving through the solar system. The program let students change the mass and location of two objects in the solar system. After each change, the computer showed the effect on the gravitational force between both objects. Student 4 chose to experiment with the mass and location of Earth and its moon. Her results are shown.
